column6: a coalition of armed forces and forest protection forces in national parks Khon Bori district
column9: arrested alarge group of Cambodians.------The Cambodians illegally crossed the border to log rosewood.------In the operation
column10: Thai forces surrounded the suspects the Tulan National Park. Many of them escaped into the jungle
column11: leaving some behind. A total of 37 hammocks
column14: rifles and logging equipment was found at their makeshift camp.------The forces stormed the forest and arrested 13 suspects
column15: all of them young men from across Cambodia.------ Thai forces later detained five more Cambodians
column16: with 18 of them currently being sent for questioning.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/290786
